channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nestlé fires CEO Laurent Freixe after less than a year over workplace affair
item.description: Nestlé SA has its third chief executive in little more than a year, after the Swiss-based food conglomerate fired CEO Laurent Freixe on Monday due to ...

item.title: Retirees are told to ‘work longer’ to make ends meet. But what if the jobs disappear?
item.description: Here are three ways to deal with losing expected income in retirement.

item.title: Katy Perry’s court testimony confirms her ex, Orlando Bloom, is real owner of Montecito mansion
item.description: Katy Perry testified in the yearslong legal fight with an ailing Army veteran over the purchase of his $15 million Montecito, Calif., mansion.

item.title: ‘We own our home’: I’m 70 and have $2.6 million for retirement. Is 80% in equities too risky?
item.description: “We have been living primarily off my pensions, but plan on big family trips soon.”

item.title: Bill Belichick finds a buyer in just 5 days for $3.9 million Nantucket beach cottage
item.description: Legendary Patriots head coach Bill Belichick has found a buyer for his sprawling beachfront Massachusetts cottage.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
